synopsis.text: Kaito, a young, enthusiastic elementary school student, finds himself in a financial predicament when he unexpectedly accrues a debt of 10 billion yen! To pay off this astronomical sum, he must excel in 'Hero Battle,' a futuristic cyber sport that combines technology and combat. Using a powerful, unlisted hero suit known as 'Enter the Gold,' which he rents from a suspicious priest named Sennen, Kaito must triumph in battles against other players who also utilize unique hero suits. As he navigates through the thrilling world of Hero Battles in Big Money City, Kaito's mission is to clear his debt and uphold the game's motto: 'Change your money with justice!'
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
